name: Redemption (itch) (DeadGameStudios)
description:
A horror game made in 24 hours during Seamedu game jam 2019

Team Size: 4
  • Aditya Pavan Gadi: Game Art/Design
  • Hrushikesh Bhat: Game Programmer/Developer
  • Riya Sinha: Level Design
  • Mohammed Adnan Ahmed: Character Design
Objective:

Escape the hospital by solving the mystery via hidden clues before the time runs out.

 

Story:

One day when _____ wakes up she finds herself trapped in an abandoned mental asylum. She doesn’t remember how she got there. She shouted for help but nobody showed up. Next, she realized that her room was locked and decided to look for the keys. She finds the first set of keys in the cupboard. Then she unlocked the door and tries to get out through the corridor. Ironically that door was locked too. She has to try and solve the clues to next key. After she unlocked the door and walks through and is greeted by a ghost like thing but it does not harm her.

She has to go down the stairs to another set of rooms where she has to figure out a way to start the lift and be aware of the mad doctor.

Once the lift starts, she makes her way to the morgue and the game ends…...

 

Controls:
  • WASD / Arrow Keys: to move.
  • Shift + Movement: run.
  • E: Interact.
  • Mouse Movement: Camera Control.
Art Style:

Semi Realistic.
